What an inspiring day today with so many powerful women at the 2020 Women on Boards symposium on diversity. The initial goal was to raise the percentage of women on US company boards to 20% or greater by the year 2020 and as of today we have already reached that goal! Duffy Group is a proud supporter of this national initiative.

Duffy Group, Inc. is a recruitment firm that works with corporations to help them find the right talent.  ‘The best (candidates) can’t be hired, they must be courted.’  As a virtual extension of our client’s team, we focus on delivering value in every aspect of the process.  Talent gaps, especially at the professional level, restrict an organization’s productivity and bottom-line on a daily basis. We understand the importance of quality candidates and an effective process that provides a solid return-on-investment.Recruit for Renewable Energy companies, including solar, wind and electric storage, EV, Grid companies. Additional experience in Pharmaceutical, Healthcare, Food Manufacturing, Biotech, computer technology and Telecommunications. We strategically target our client's competition to directly source the most qualified candidates.  Cold-calling into your competition is our specialty. Additionally, after the position is filled with a great candidate, our clients receive all of the data gathered during the search including the names of all candidates contacted, their contact information, compensation and any other pertinent market data. This is a part of our service and assists our clients in understanding the market in their industry.

Eden is an incredible individual with the energy and drive to complete any task that she is given with enthusiasm and determination. As an HR executive, Eden blends a high degree of professionalism, years of experience and a tremendous sense of humor to put people at ease in every situation. My first introduction to Eden was during the interview process for my candidacy as a senior executive with Mastering Computers and she found a way to put me at ease with her comfortable style and easy candor. When we then worked together, she continued that easy rapport as she helped me integrate into the organization and provided assistance with HR issues during several transition periods the company went through in a very short period of time. Eden is a pleasure to work with and has continued to grow in her career and her abilities as an HR professional.

summary: Given the recruiting industry has many players, the market is filled with a lot of noise and conflicting information, especially around recruiting fees and success statistics. Employers seem to think they are limited to a recruiting model based on a candidate’s compensation. In the new economy, employers were asking for a recruiting solution that was more efficient and cost effective...so we introduced a different model and it's not based on a candidate's compensation! As a result, we are saving our clients over 50% in traditional search fees.When we say “Recruitment Redefined” they are not just words, they are reality for our clients. While we are headquartered in Phoenix, we have a national presence and in the last few years have expanded globally working in Europe, Asia, and Brazil.Working directly with clients to staff large scale projects involving multiple hires, developing outsourcing models and revamping staffing departments. Search specialties include: New Technologies, Medical Device, IT Consulting, Manufacturing and Alternative Energy.Recent Recruiting Projects and Placements:General Manager, WindDirector of Business Development, TransportationHRIS AnalystSenior Quality Engineer- ManufacturingProduct Development Engineer- Medical DeviceIT Project ManagerIT ConsultantTransmission Engineer- Utilities
